rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with welcoming aesthetic and Vastu compliant orientation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area for family gatherings; open plan design integrating natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and living room, facilitating comfortable dining space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with functional layout, south-facing for sunlight and energy efficiency.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A serene space dedicated to reading and study, designed with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Additional bathroom for visitors; placed strategically near the living area.

openings.location: Between Living Room and Dining Area

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with ensuite bathroom and a private balcony; designed for tranquility and relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom for additional family members.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Guest room or secondary bedroom with ample storage space.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite master bathroom integrated within the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A well-equipped private gym space for family fitness, placed away from living quarters to ensure privacy and minimal disturbance.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a focus on natural light and a quiet environment.

rooms.name: Study/Observation Deck
rooms.description: A multi-purpose space for study or relaxation; designed to overlook the surrounding landscape.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for laundry and storage, ensuring efficient use of space.

garage.description: A two-car garage integrated with the ground floor plan for easy access to the farmhouse. Designed with ample space for storage and vehicle maintenance.
garage.location: Adjacent to the main entrance on the south side
